import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; function Invoicetable(props) { let tb=props.invoices.map((invoice,index)=>{ return(< tr key={index}> {invoice.date} {invoice.orderno} {invoice.name} {invoice.duedate} {invoice.amount} ) }) return ( {tb}
Date Invoice No Order No Customer Name Due Date Amount
) } export default Invoicetable
